About Me

I am a mission-driven and detail-oriented software developer in test, looking for full-stack developer jobs.

BIO

I’ve always sought out opportunities and challenges that are meaningful to me, and never stopped engaging my passion to help others and solve problems. I enjoy using my obsessive attention to detail, also my unequivocal love for making things, and my mission-driven work ethic to literally make a difference. That's why I’m excited to make a big impact at a high growth company.
